subject: Football (College)
Orange Bowl (Football Game)
Bowl Games
lead_paragraph: A late quarterback switch paid off for South Carolina in the Outback Bowl, and senior fullback Lonnie Pryor led Florida State to a 21-point victory in the Orange Bowl.
snippet: A late quarterback switch paid off for South Carolina in the Outback Bowl, and senior fullback Lonnie Pryor led Florida State to a 21-point victory in the Orange Bowl.
